name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Full Screen for Google Tasks - Desktop App for Google Tasks | TaskDisplay

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display full screen for Google Tasks and acts as desktop app for Google Tasks. Use this Google Tasks manager for more productivity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TaskDisplay is a powerful desktop app for Google Tasks that manages tasks using a Kanban board. Here’s why it’s the ultimate Google Tasks manager alternative to the TasksBoard app:

- Effortless Organization: With TaskDisplay, you can seamlessly organize your personal or work projects into boards and lists.

- Collaboration Made Simple: This desktop app for Google Tasks lets you share task lists and boards with teammates, colleagues, or family members. Edit and sync Google shared tasks in real time.

- Visualize Your Workflow: This full screen for Google task board overviews your Google tasks. Quickly identify what’s in progress, what’s pending, and what’s completed.

- Boost Productivity: No more scrolling through endless lists or forgetting critical tasks. By visualizing your workload with this full screen for Google task, you’ll make firm decisions, allocate concentration efficiently, and achieve more in the same amount of time.

- Seamless Integration: As a full screen for Google task, TaskDisplay syncs seamlessly with your Google apps, including Gmail, Drive, Sheets, Slides, and Calendar.

----------

Main features

- Add, edit, duplicate, archive, or delete unlimited tasks
- Set reminder date
- Real-time synchronization
- Add, rename, duplicate, sort, archive, or delete unlimited lists
- Share task lists
- Add and share task boards (Paid plan only)
- Customize board background
- Dark theme
- Add and manage team members (Team plan only)

----------

Pricing
- Free: $0 per month with limited features
- Individual: $3.90 per month
- Team: $4.50 per month per member

TaskDisplay isn’t just a task manager; it’s your productivity ally. Try this TasksBoard alternative today and experience the difference at taskdisplay.com!
